code: const API_URL='http://localhost:3001';export const getJoke=async searchTerm=>{const url=searchTerm?`${API_URL}/joke?contains=${encodeURIComponent(searchTerm)}`:`${API_URL}/joke`;const response=await fetch(url);if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Error al obtener el chiste');}return response.json();};export const saveJoke=async joke=>{const response=await fetch(`${API_URL}/joke/save`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(joke)});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Error al guardar el chiste');}return response.json();};
